rules.description: HHKB: Set ESC (top-left) to Backquote (`)
HHKB: Set Backquote (top-right `) to ESC
HHKB: Set Left Option (pressed alone) to Command-H
HHKB: Switch Delete_Backspace and Backslash
Set CapsLock to ESC (pressed alone) and Ctrl (otherwise)
Set Fn-CapsLock to CapsLock
Set Fn-h/j/k/l to Left/Down/Up/Right (allowing any modifiers)
Set Left Opt-h/j/k/l to Left/Down/Up/Right (allowing any modifiers)
Set Fn-a to Home, Fn-e to End (allowing any modifiers)
Set Left Opt-a to Home, -e to End (allowing Shift)
Set Left Ctrl-v to PgDn, Opt-v to PgUp (allowing Shift, not in Vim)
Set Left Opt-f/b to move forward/backward a word (allowing Shift, not in Vim, Terminal, iTerm2, Finder)
Set Left Ctrl to ESC (pressed alone)
Set Fn (pressed alone) to Cmd-h
Set Left Cmd-h to Backspace (allowing no modifiers)
Set Left Cmd (pressed alone) to open Quicksilver
Set Right Cmd (pressed alone) to show OmniFocus quick entry
MacVim: Set Left Ctrl-i to Ctrl-\
MacVim: Set Cmd-p to Cmd-b
Video apps: Set tab to toggle navigation, h/l and a/d to navigate

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Video Navigation (h/l, a/d) Disabled" with title "Navigation OFF"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Video Navigation (h/l, a/d) Enabled" with title "Navigation ON"'

rules.description: iTerm: Set Cmd-p to Opt-C, Cmd-b to Opt-Cmd-/
Set Opt-Cmd-/ to Shift-Opt-Cmd-/
The Long Dark: Set g to cmd
